mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MESSAGE ( PRIVATEMSGNO, SENDERUSERNAME, RECEIVERUSERNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, SENDDATE, READYN, DELETESENDER, DELETERECEIVER, MESSAGETYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRIVATEMSGNO.NEXTVAL, #{senderUserName}, #{receiverUserName}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', 'N', 'N', #{messageType} )
